#How to setup your Blackberry Projects.

= Introduction =

*Follow the below steps*

1 Checkout the Sample Project from the Source
2 Modify the local.properties file as per your development settings
3 Go to <Project>/Build folder
4 Execute "Ant usage" - To see the Available targets
  a) Releasing for all OS execute "Ant release" in command prompt
  b) Testing for all OS execute "Ant simulator" in command prompt
